TopicTitle: Whats the chance we will see x64 worked on again in the future (near or far)

Articles.Content: I loved x64, even with all of its bugs it really allowed me to abuse my 16GB of RAM to all of its glory. I know that they cut x64 due to current Unity limitations at the time, but what is the chance we will see it again?? I would like to see it if most of the major bugs could be ironed out...

It's a pretty high chance. It looks like 1.1 may be focused around things like 64 bit and Unity 5 support.

Read about it [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118495-Squadcast-Summary-%282015-05-02%29-1-0-Outbound-Edition%21).
